title: Export User Data for GDPR Request
description: A user from the EU submits a GDPR data access request, asking for all of their personal data stored by the product.

tasks.description: Verify the user's identity to ensure the request is legitimate.
Use a data export tool to gather all personal data associated with the user's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the GDPR export script for the user.

tasks.description: Provide the exported data to the user in a machine-readable format (e.g., JSON).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent delivers the data export, fulfilling the GDPR request.
